Lipsus Kasak-kusuk Detektif Swasta
Bak di Film, Begini Cara Kerja Detektif Swasta di Indonesia
03 Nov 2019, 05:37 by Danang Sugianto


Foto: Angies List

Jakarta - Detektif swasta, sebuah profesi yang benar ada di kehidupan nyata. Cara kerja mereka juga mirip dengan cerita detektif di film yakni melakukan penyelidikan dengan berbagai cara hingga teka-teki terpecahkan.Untuk menemukan para penyedia jasa detektif swasta cukup sebenarnya cukup mudah. Sebab mereka kini juga mulai menawarkan jasanya di media sosial seperti Facebook dan Instagram.Kebanyakan dari jasa yang ditemukan menawarkan penyelidikan kasus perselingkuhan. Ternyata jasa seperti itu cukup banyak yang mencari. Terbukti dari banyaknya pelaku yang menawarkan jasa tersebut.Salah satunya adalah Habibi, dia sudah menjalani profesinya selama hampir 5 tahun. Dalam 2 tahun belakangan ini, dia menggeluti profesinya cukup serius. Dia membentuk tim, mulai dari tim yang terjun di lapangan, tim khusus IT yang mem-back up melalui jejaring internet bahkan untuk meretas sebuah sistem keamanan, hingga tim marketing untuk promosi jasanya.Habibi juga menerima penyelidikan hampir di seluruh wilayah Indonesia. Dia membangun jaringan dengan beberapa pihak di wilayah yang mau menjadi koordinatornya. Lalu bagaimana cara kerjanya?Habibi menjelaskan untuk tahapan awal tergantung kasus yang akan dijalani. Jika tujuannya untuk mencari bukti perselingkuhan yang dilakukan pasangannya, Habibi meminta informasi awal tentang kebiasaan targetnya."Biasanya yang datang terkait perselingkuhan pasti sudah ada kecurigaan, ada indikasi terlebih dahulu. Nah kita minta informasi keseharian targetnya seperti apa. Kerja di mana. Atau kalau sudah ketahuan, dan tengah mencari bukti, kita minta informasi kemana saja dia mainnya," terangnya kepada detikcom.Informasi awal itu juga untuk menentukan tarif. Maklum, jasa seperti ini tidak ada tarif yang pasti. Habibi hanya memperhitungkan biaya operasional selama dia dan timnya melakukan penyelidikan. Untuk awal dia menghitung biaya operasional untuk 1 minggu."Kita hitung untuk beroperasi untuk penyelidikan awal 7 hari. Waktunya memang nggak tentu sampai misinya berhasil. Tapi pernah 1 hari kita sudah dapat bukti dia selingkuh, kadang bisa satu bulan," ujarnya.(das/toy)

Lipsus The private detective gossip
Like in Film, Here's How Private Detective Works in Indonesia
03 Nov 2019, 05:37 by Danang Sugianto


Photo: Angies List

Jakarta - Private investigator, a profession that really exists in real life. The way they work is also similar to the detective story in the film, which is to investigate in various ways until the puzzle is solved. To find private detective service providers is actually quite easy. Because they are now also starting to offer services on social media like Facebook and Instagram. Most of the services found offer an investigation of cases of infidelity. It turns out that quite a lot of services are looking for. Evidenced by the many actors who offer these services. One of them is Habibi, he has been undergoing his profession for almost 5 years. In the past 2 years, he has taken his profession quite seriously. He formed a team, starting from the team that plunged in the field, a special IT team that backed up through the internet network even to hack a security system, to the marketing team for the promotion of his services. Habibi also received investigations in almost all regions of Indonesia. He built a network with several parties in the region who wanted to be the coordinator. Then how does it work? Habibi explained for the initial stages depending on the case to be undertaken. If the aim is to look for evidence of adultery by her partner, Habibi asks for preliminary information about her target's habits. "Usually those who come related to infidelity must already have suspicions, there are indications in advance. Now we ask for the target's daily information like what. Work where. Or if it's already caught, and looking for evidence, we ask for information where he played, "he explained to AFP. The initial information was also to determine the tariff. Understandably, services like this do not have fixed rates. Habibi only calculates operational costs as long as he and his team investigate. For the beginning he calculated operational costs for 1 week. "We calculate to operate for an initial investigation of 7 days. The time is indeed uncertain until the mission is successful. But once in 1 day we have proof that he cheated, sometimes it can be one month," he said. / toy)
